Author: Decker#3767
Content: @hamid502 it's not yet added to Agama. But actually - you don't need Agama to mine KMDICE. You can just use any of your R-addresses from which you have privkey, or you can mine it on R-address related to your Agama's passphrase (it's same as having privkey).
